name: Leith Hill Heathland Walk, Leith Hill

ai.summary: A gentle 5.6 km circuit hike around Leith Hill, weaving through open heathland with occasional woodland. Easy terrain, suitable for families and beginners, with scenic views across the Surrey Hills.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths across open heath with some uneven ground and a few tree roots. Gentle ascents to Leith Hill summit, with sandy or grassy surfaces; expect mud after rain and loose gravel in exposed sections.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. The weather on the hill can change quickly; bring layers and a waterproof. Stay on marked paths; heathland can be uneven and slippery when wet. Be aware of ticks in heathland; check yourself after the walk. Mobile reception may be limited in parts of the route; carry a map and compass or a GPS device. Bring water and a small first-aid kit; plan for safe, short rest stops.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and summer when the heathland is in bloom; autumn offers colorful scenery; winter can be muddy and windy.

seo.title: Leith Hill Heathland Walk – Easy 5.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a gentle 5.6 km circuit at Leith Hill in the UK. Easy terrain, heathland scenery, and panoramic views—perfect for a family-friendly day out.
